quizDescription: Test your knowledge of action movies with this adrenaline-pumping trivia quiz!

questions.question: Which action movie franchise features a character named John McClane, a tough and resourceful police officer?
questions.explanation: The 'Die Hard' franchise follows John McClane, portrayed by Bruce Willis, as he battles terrorists and criminals in various high-stakes situations.

questions.question: Which action movie features a retired CIA agent seeking vengeance for the death of his daughter?
questions.explanation: 'Taken' stars Liam Neeson as Bryan Mills, a former CIA agent who uses his skills to rescue his daughter from human traffickers.

questions.question: Which action movie features a character named Indiana Jones, an archaeologist who goes on daring adventures to uncover ancient artifacts?
questions.explanation: The 'Indiana Jones' series stars Harrison Ford as the titular character, an adventurous archaeologist known for his iconic hat and whip.

questions.question: Which action movie follows a team of skilled thieves led by Dominic Toretto, who are known for their love of fast cars?
questions.explanation: 'The Fast and the Furious' franchise centers around Dominic Toretto, played by Vin Diesel, and his team of street racers who become skilled thieves.

questions.question: Which action movie features a secret agent known by the code name '007'?
questions.explanation: The 'James Bond' series follows the adventures of a British secret service agent known by the code name '007' and is famous for its action-packed spy missions.
